title: Add Google site verification meta tag

requirements.text: Add the Google site verification meta tag <meta name="google-site-verification" content="3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7..." /> inside the <head> section of frontend/index.html

quotes:
Add this meta tag inside the <head> section of my website and deploy it:

<meta name="google-site-verification" content="3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7..." />

acceptanceCriteria: The meta tag is present in the <head> section of frontend/index.html
The meta tag includes the exact content attribute value: 3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7...
The meta tag is properly formatted as a self-closing HTML tag

constraints: Do not modify any other meta tags or head content beyond adding this single verification tag
nonGoals: Changing any other SEO meta tags
Modifying structured data or Open Graph properties
Altering any frontend components or styling
